# The `PointerLikeTypeTraits` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A traits type that is used to handle pointer types and things that are just wrappers for pointers as a uniform entity. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A traits type that is used to handle pointer types and things that are just wrappers for pointers as a uniform entity.
